articles.title: Too soon to treat COVID-19 like flu as Omicron spreads - WHO - Reuters
articles.description: The Omicron variant of COVID-19 is on track to infect more than half of Europeans, but it should not yet be seen as a flu-like endemic illness, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Tuesday.
articles.content: COPENHAGEN, Jan 11 (Reuters) - The Omicron variant of COVID-19 is on track to infect more than half of Europeans, but it should not yet be seen as a flu-like endemic illness, the World Health Organiz… [+1950 chars]

articles.author: Samantha Beech, CNN
articles.title: European Parliament President David Sassoli dies age 65 - CNN
articles.description: European Parliament President David Sassoli has died in Italy, according to a Tweet from his spokesman early Tuesday local time.
articles.content:
(CNN)European Parliament President David Sassoli has died in Italy, according to a Tweet from his spokesman early Tuesday local time.
"The @EP_President David Sassoli passed away at 1.15 a.m. on 11 … [+2013 chars]

articles.title: Labour MP spends summer break in Europe after securing MIQ slot - Otago Daily Times
articles.description: Labour's Marja Lubeck has spent the summer break in Europe, visiting family in the Netherlands. The list MP, who contests Auckland's Kaipara ki...
